items.sentence: Tom has unknowingly broken more than a few hearts.
I tried to do everything that I could to stop Tom.
Everyone in my family wears glasses except for me.
That's not the main reason why Tom should do that.
That's not the main reason why Tom has to do that.
I decided to leave my job at the end of the month.
I want to find a blonde, blue-eyed European woman.
You always make such a big deal out of everything.
I can't buy anything until I get my next paycheck.
Put everything you want to throw away in this box.
